name: Shoot That Pizza (Kevin)
description:
Shoot That Pizza tells the story of a brave group of resistance fighters as they mount humanity's last stand against the D'mino empire.

Z is the only button that really does much of anything.

Created by: RubixsQube

Art by: lloydp

Music by: RoccoW, BoxCat, RoleMusic
